department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

remark.ch: 建議修過「人工智慧」、「自然語言處理」、「機器學習」課程再選修。

goal.en: Web Intelligence (WI) and Message Understanding (MU) refer to applications and technologies used to retrieve, collect, analyze, and present information from the Web. The purpose of this course is to introduce the techniques and algorithms for information processing on the Web to promote the integration and construction of new Web services. Learning Objectives - Understand the concepts and components of Web Intelligence and Message Understanding - Evaluate the technologies that make up WI (data mining, machine learning, Natural language processing) - Define techniques for the sucess of online platforms - Plan and implement an online information system
goal.ch: Web Intelligence（WI）和訊息理解（MU）含括從Web擷取、收集、分析和呈現資訊的技術和應用。 本課程的目的是介紹機器學習（ML）和自然語言處理（NLP）的技術，以促進資訊整合應用服務程序的整合和構建。 學習目標 - 理解Web Intelligence和消息理解的概念和組件 - 評估構成WI的技術（數據挖掘，機器學習，自然語言處理） - 定義在線平台成功的技術 - 規劃和實施資訊系統

content.en:
1. Web Basics: DOM
- Web Crawler & Scraping
- Information Retrieval & Search Engine
2. Deep Learning Review
- Supervised learning
- Neural Networks: CNN, RNN, Attention
3. Word Embedding & Pretrained Language Models
- Word Embedding
- BERT, GPT
4. NLP Task Introduction
- Classification, Sequence Labeling, Generation
5. Opinion Extraction
- Sentiment Analysis
- Aspect-based Sentiment Analysis
6. Web Data Extraction
- Boilerplate Removal / Main Content Extraction
- Search Result Extraction
7. Task-Oriented Dialog Systems
8. Chatbots
Final Project:
- Question Answer Pair Generation
- Event Source Page Mining
content.ch:
1. Web Search Engine: Information Retrieval
2. Deep Learning Review
3. Word Embedding & Pretrained Language Models
4. NLP Task Introduction
5. Opinion Extraction
6. Web Data Extraction
7. Task-Oriented Dialog Systems
8. Chatbots
Final Project:
- Question Answer Pair Generation
- Event Source Page Mining

textbook.ch: Text analytics with python - 2nd edition https://github.com/dipanjanS/text-analytics-with-python Deep Learning for Human Language Processing by Prof. Hung-Yi Lee@NTU http://speech.ee.ntu.edu.tw/~tlkagk/courses_DLHLP20.html A Practitioner's Guide to Natural Language Processing (Part I) — Processing & Understanding Text https://towardsdatascience.com/a-practitioners-guide-to-natural-language-processing-part-i-processing-understanding-text-9f4abfd13e72
